aboutPage.title: About Nex Architects
aboutPage.intro: We are a multidisciplinary team of architects, designers, and engineers dedicated to creating meaningful spaces.
aboutPage.missionText: To shape environments that blend functionality, beauty, and sustainability, improving the way people live and work.
aboutPage.visionText: To become a leading architecture studio in Central Asia, known for innovation, quality, and timeless design.

A residential complex was completed, combining innovation with cultural traditions.
Expansion into foreign markets with sustainable solutions developed with international partners.
